metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a member of Gur Tribe at Cazador's Palace
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Gur Follow UpApproach the Gur Leader, a dialog will be started.After the dialog ends you can click on any individual Gur.

0.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
0.text: Few people can stand against a vampire, let alone one filled with infernal power. You did well.

1.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
1.text: Today's battle is done, but tomorrow will bring a new fight.

2.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
2.text: All those spawn locked up down there. I don't know if I should loathe them or pity them.

3.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
3.text: You stamped out the entire Szarr legacy in one afternoon. A good day's work.

4.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
4.text: You could have killed them all. You could have ended Szarr's legacy today.
